name: Heavy Hammer
description: Grum's favorite forging hammer. It feels heavy with purpose.

name: Iron Shield
description: A sturdy shield bearing the village crest. A symbol of protection.

name: Wagon Ticket
description: A stamped parchment granting passage on the next supply wagon.

name: Family Locket
description: A silver locket containing a portrait of the King. Proof of identity.

name: Royal Signet Ring
description: A heavy gold ring bearing the crest of the King.

name: Rubber Duckie
description: A bright yellow rubber duckie. It squeaks if you squeeze it.

name: Brass Bell
description: The Town Crier's trusty bell. It is polished to a shine.

name: Empty Tankard
description: A wooden tankard stained with ale. It smells faintly of hops.

name: Rusty Horseshoe
description: A discarded piece of iron. Legends say it brings good luck.

name: Red Apple
description: A shiny red apple. It looks crisp and delicious.
